step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands toward your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid pulling forward.
Holding the stretch for 30 seconds is great. Ensure your head stays upright throughout the hold.
You're returning to the start position. Pay attention to keeping your wrists and elbows aligned as you reverse the motion.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your wrists straighter and elbows closer to your head. Remember to hold the stretch and avoid pulling forward.
